dt: {bc}existing since or belonging to earlier times {bc}{sx|ancient||}
{bc}being in the style or fashion of former times
{bc}made in or representative of the work of an earlier period

pt: {sc}old{/sc} {sc}ancient{/sc} {sc}venerable{/sc} {sc}antique{/sc} {sc}antiquated{/sc} {sc}archaic{/sc} {sc}obsolete{/sc} mean having come into existence or use in the more or less distant past. {sc}old{/sc} may apply to either actual or merely relative length of existence.
{sc}ancient{/sc} applies to occurrence, existence, or use in or survival from the distant past.
{sc}venerable{/sc} stresses the impressiveness and dignity of great age.
{sc}antique{/sc} applies to what has come down from a former or ancient time.
{sc}antiquated{/sc} implies being discredited or outmoded or otherwise inappropriate to the present time.
{sc}archaic{/sc} implies having the character or characteristics of a much earlier time.

pt.t: the play used {it}archaic{/it} language to convey a sense of period

pt: {sc}obsolete{/sc} may apply to something regarded as no longer acceptable or useful even though it is still in existence.

pt.t: a computer that makes earlier models {it}obsolete{/it}

et: Middle French, from Latin {it}antiquus{/it}, from {it}ante{/it} before {ma}{mat|ante-|}{/ma}
shortdef: existing since or belonging to earlier times : ancient
being in the style or fashion of former times
made in or representative of the work of an earlier period; also : being an antique

dt: {bc}a relic or object of ancient times
{bc}a work of art, piece of furniture, or decorative object made at an earlier period and according to various customs laws at least 100 years ago
{bc}a manufactured product (such as an automobile) from an earlier period

shortdef: a relic or object of ancient times
a work of art, piece of furniture, or decorative object made at an earlier period and according to various customs laws at least 100 years ago
a manufactured product (such as an automobile) from an earlier period

dt: {bc}to finish or refinish in antique style {bc}give an appearance of age to

shortdef: to finish or refinish in antique style : give an appearance of age to

dt: {bc}a green mottled or veined serpentine marble or calcareous serpentine much used for indoor decoration especially by the ancient Romans

et: borrowed from French {it}verd antique, vert antique{/it}, translation of Italian {it}verde antico{/it}, literally, "ancient green"
shortdef: a green mottled or veined serpentine marble or calcareous serpentine much used for indoor decoration especially by the ancient Romans
